item.title: Crossmark Policy: Corrections and Retractions
item.description: Crossmark is an industry initiative to provide readers with an easy way to locate the most up-to-date and authoritative version. Using the Crossmark link on our articles will allow readers to quickly check if the article they are reading includes all substantive updates.

item.title: Author Submission Guidelines
item.description: Author submission guidelines for Neuroanatomy and Behaviour. These provide details on manuscript preparation, referencing style, and reporting standards.

item.title: Peer Review Policy
item.description: Details our standards for reviewer qualifications, reviewer collaboration, confidentiality, and our approach to review transparency.

item.title: Peer Reviewer Guidelines
item.description: If you’ve been asked to review a paper for us, read these guidelines to help you understand what we expect.

item.title: Editor Guidelines
item.description: Our editors apply their expert judgement free of commercial incentives. Quality is the only thing that counts.

item.title: Prior Publication and Sharing Policy
item.description: Want to share your article prior to or after publication? No problem. We welcome preprints and strongly encourage you to share the final version through your institutional repository and anywhere else.

item.title: Copyright and Fair Dealing Policy
item.description: We apply the author’s choice of license while ensuring that works can be reused for scholarly and charitable purposes.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: What personal information we collect, how we collect it, how long we keep it, and who else is involved.
